definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: The etymological meaning of both words is “something added on.”
sentences.chinese: 從詞源學的角度來看，兩個詞都有“附加物”的意思。

sentences.english: Dictionaries are still good for obscure usages and etymologies.
sentences.chinese: 字典依然擅長於不常用的用法和詞源。

sentences.english: Quest, question, there is no coincidence that there is an etymological link between the two.
sentences.chinese: 探索，問題，這兩者在詞源上有所關聯並非巧合。

sentences.english: Etymologically no offensive connotation is attached to the term.
sentences.chinese: 從詞源沒有攻擊性的內涵是重視的術語。

sentences.english: So the etymology of vichyssoise will come first.
sentences.chinese: 那麼先來看一下這個詞的詞源。

sentences.english: The word beer itself comes from a Latin verb meaning "to drink", and the ancient Romans were certainly no strangers to the brew.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒這個詞源自拉丁文動詞，意爲“飲用”。

sentences.english: I don't suppose they spent much time looking into the etymology of mustang.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他們並沒有仔細考慮這個詞的詞源。

sentences.english: It is all the same root.
So what does all this have to do with etymology?
sentences.chinese: 那麼這一切與詞源有什麼關係呢？

sentences.english: The etymology of the name is obscure.
sentences.chinese: 這個名字的詞源尚不清楚。

sentences.english: The origin of OK became the Holy Grail of etymology.
sentences.chinese: Ok的出典成了詞源學夢寐以求的聖盃。

sentences.english: How can be used in IE5 screen truncation source download?
sentences.chinese: 哪有能在IE5下使用的屏幕截詞源碼下載？

sentences.english: The etymologies of the words are interesting.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個詞的詞源也很有趣。

sentences.english: A big dictionary often gives the derivation of words.
sentences.chinese: 大辭典往往提供詞條的詞源。

sentences.english: So now that I've educated myself, here's the etymology.
sentences.chinese: 因此我受教了，這是它的詞源。

sentences.english: Etymologists blame William Shakespeare for this.
sentences.chinese: 詞源學家認爲這是莎士比亞乾的好事。

definition: radical of a compound word (in European language)
variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
Joseph Needham (1900-1995), British biochemist and author of Science and Civilization in China
